short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calming and Positive messages whenever you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover a world of calm every time you open a new tab with our Tranquility New Tab extension for Chrome!

Immerse yourself in an oasis of peace and inspiration. Each new tab delivers calming affirmations set against a backdrop designed to soothe your senses. Plus, search the web efficiently using Bing.

Add Tranquility New Tab to your Chrome today and embrace serenity with every click!

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to install the Tranquility New Tab Chrome extension, set the Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to Tranquility New Tab with web search by Bing, and to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
